dcterms:description: The HMC-QU-TAU dataset consists of 320 echocardiography recordings of A2C and A4C views from 160 individuals; 103 MI patients and 57 non-MI subjects, used for evaluating the performance of the SAF-Net model in detecting myocardial infarction.
dcterms:title: HMC-QU-TAU
